meanings.definition: A type of self-service restaurant where food and drinks are dispensed from vending machines.
meanings.sent1: At the automat, you can get a sandwich from a machine.
meanings.sent2: I went to the automat and got a soda from the vending machine.
meanings.sent3: The automat was so busy that the vending machines had a line!
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked like an automat, efficiently processing information.
meanings.sent5: The automat hummed with the sound of vending machines dispensing snacks.

meanings.definition: A machine that automatically performs a specific task, often in a mechanical or repetitive manner.
meanings.sent1: The automat in the factory assembled the parts quickly.
meanings.sent2: He programmed the automat to sort the items based on size.
meanings.sent3: The automat seemed to have a mind of its own, working tirelessly.
meanings.sent4: Time flew by as he watched the automat complete the task effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The automat's precision was unmatched, completing the job flawlessly.
